user.title: Set up Tasmanian Transport
user.description:
Configure your bus stop for real-time departure tracking.

**To find your stop ID:**
1. Visit [Tasmanian Transport website]({stop_finder_url})
2. Search for your bus stop
3. Copy the ID from the URL (e.g., 7109023 from .../#?stop=7109023)

data_description.stop_id: The unique ID of your bus stop (e.g., 7109023)
data_description.scheduled_departure_time: Your usual bus departure time in 24-hour format (e.g., 08:13)
data_description.time_to_get_there: How many minutes it takes you to walk to the bus stop
data_description.early_threshold: How many minutes early is considered 'early' for notifications
data_description.late_threshold: How many minutes late is considered 'late' for notifications
data_description.departure_reminder: How many minutes before departure to remind you to leave
